content: कुट्टिम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Paved with small stones, decorated with mosaic. --मः, --मं {@--1@} An inlaid or paved floor, ground paved with small stones, pavement; कांतेंदुकांतोपलकुट्टिमेषु <ls>Śi. 3. 44</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 9.</ls> {@--2@} Ground prepared for the site of a mansion. {@--3@} A jewel-mine. {@--4@} The pomegranate. {@--5@} A hut, cottage, small house.
